div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 22:58 pm EDT

div.div: Partly cloudy, with a low around 21. Calm wind becoming southeast around 5 mph after midnight.

A 50 percent chance of showers after 2pm. Increasing clouds, with a high near 51. Breezy, with a southwest wind 10 to 15 mph increasing to 15 to 20 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph.

Rain showers before midnight, then rain and snow showers between midnight and 2am, then a chance of snow showers after 2am. Low around 25. Northwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
